content:
QuorumLossMode QuorumLossMode Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Type of QuorumLoss that will be invoked.

Edit

In this Article

[Serializable]
public enum QuorumLossMode<Serializable>
Public Enum QuorumLossMode
Attributes
SerializableAttribute

Fields

AllReplicas AllReplicas

Full Quorum loss mode : All replicas for a partition will be down that will cause a quorum loss.

Invalid Invalid

Reserved. Do not pass into API.
QuorumReplicas QuorumReplicas

Partial Quorum loss mode : Minimum number of replicas for a partition will be down that will cause a quorum loss.
